Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw different types of animals and the foods they eat.
The student can illustrate animals drinking water.
The student can show a plant that is healthy and growing because it has water.
The student can depict a plant that is healthy and growing because it has light.
The student can illustrate a plant that is not growing because it lacks water.
The student can show a plant that is not growing because it is in the dark without light.
